elements.label: i
elements.title: inclination; angle with respect to x-y ecliptic plane
elements.name: i

phys_par.name: H
phys_par.title: absolute magnitude
phys_par.desc: absolute magnitude (magnitude at 1 au from Sun and observer)

phys_par.title: magnitude slope
phys_par.desc: magnitude slope parameter used in the standard asteroid H/G magnitude law
phys_par.name: G

phys_par.desc: standard gravitational parameter: product of the mass (M) and gravitational constant (G)
phys_par.title: GM
phys_par.name: GM

phys_par.title: rotation period
phys_par.name: rot_per

phys_par.title: Tholen spectral type
phys_par.notes: used 7 color indices; used ground-based radiometric albedo
phys_par.name: spec_T

phys_par.notes: based on a high-resolution spectrum by Xu et al. (1995) or Bus and Binzel (2002)
phys_par.name: spec_B
phys_par.title: SMASSII spectral type
